formatDescription: Windows Movie Maker is video editing software by Microsoft. A .mswmm file won't typically contain any source audio or video data, rather it will contain references or pointers to the source data. For this reason extracting a .mswmm file from its context may result in the movie being unable to play. A movie exported to a video format from within the application will contain the appropriate data for portable playback.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
formatProvenance: This format is identifiable via a container signature in DROID 6 and later.
